forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain and snow. High around 5C. Winds WSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. 12-20cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and snow this morning. The rain and snow will change to all rain by the afternoon hours. High 42F. Winds WSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Snow accumulating 3 to 5 inches.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with rain and snow. Low 2C. Winds W at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of precip 100%. 2-3cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain and snow. Low 37F. Winds W at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of precip 100%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of snow. High 4C. Winds W at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of snow 100%. 7-12cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with rain and snow. High 42F. Winds W at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Snow accumulating 1 to 3 inches.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow in the evening will give way to clearing skies overnight. Low -9C. W winds shifting to ENE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of snow 60%. 2-3cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow in the evening will give way to clearing skies overnight. Low 18F. W winds shifting to ENE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of snow 60%. Snow accumulations less than one inch.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly sunny skies. High 7C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Plentiful sunshine. High 46F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy in the evening followed by periods of snow showers after midnight. Low -1C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 50%. Snow accumulations less than 2cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early, then some snow showers later at night. Low 32F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 50%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with rain and snow. High around 5C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Snowfall of 2-3cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with rain and snow showers in the morning changing to all rain in the afternoon. High 44F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 100%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. Low 4C. Winds SSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall possibly over 25mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low near 40F. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. High 9C. Winds SW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 25mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. High 49F. Winds SW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 4C. Winds SW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 25mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. Low 42F. Winds SW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall may reach one inch.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain...mixing with snow in the afternoon. High 8C. Winds SW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Snow accumulations less than 2cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. High 48F. Winds SW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near an inch.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow in the evening will give way to lingering snow showers overnight. Low -3C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 80%. Snow accumulating 3-7cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow in the evening will transition to snow showers overnight. Low 29F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 80%. Snow accumulating 1 to 3 inches.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies in the morning will give way to cloudy skies during the afternoon. High 7C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: A mix of clouds and sun early, then becoming cloudy later in the day. High 46F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow showers. Low -3C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 60%. 2-3cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Variably cloudy with snow showers. Low 29F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 60%. Snowfall around one inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and snow showers in the morning changing to rain showers in the afternoon. High 8C. Winds SW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 60%. Snowfall of 2-3cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with rain and snow showers early changing to mainly rain showers in the afternoon. High 48F. Winds SW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%. Snow accumulations less than one inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Variably cloudy with snow showers. Low -3C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 60%. 3-7cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Variable clouds with snow showers. Low 28F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 60%. Snow accumulating 1 to 3 inches.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with rain and snow showers early changing to mainly rain showers in the afternoon. High 8C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%. Snowfall of 2-3cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and snow showers in the morning changing to rain showers in the afternoon. High 48F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%. Snowfall around one inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow showers. Low -1C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 60%. 7-12cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Variably cloudy with snow showers. Low 32F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 60%. 1 to 3 inches of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with rain and snow showers. High 7C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%. Snow accumulations less than 2cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and snow showers in the morning. The rain and snow will change to rain showers in the afternoon. High 47F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Occasional snow showers. Low -4C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 50%. 2-3cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Variably cloudy with snow showers. Low 28F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 50%. Snowfall around one inch.
